content: curl up by the fire in the comfort of these irresistible crochet socks stitched in bernat forever fleece finer these socks are worked from the toe up featuring simple increases foot and leg are stitched in front and back post double_crochet to create a deep rib for warmth the afterthought heel is then worked in single_crochet you ll also practice working in the round and doing basic decreases socks are always a hit for gifting so make many to please the whole gang yarn for model bernat® forever fleece finer™ 9 9 oz/280 g 385 yds/352 m light sky 51017 1 ball sizes to fit u s women s shoe sizes s 4-6 1/2 m 7-9 1/2 l 10-12 1/2 to fit foot length 9 10-11 23 25 5-28 cm to fit foot circumference 8 9- 10 20 23-25 5 cm **to ensure best fit choose size based on foot circumference
